Title: One For Sorrow
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by), Rebecca Kirsch, David Grimm (story editor), Alyssa Clark (story editor), Yasmin Yilmaz (staff writer)
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Zuleikha Robinson, Kurt Egyiawan
Plot: Andy's foster home receives a surprising new addition as he confronts the strange incidents on the island.
